title: You and Your First Penta
body: Describe your first penta doesn't matter what map or when just tell a story mine was with {{champion:92}} at level 22 on summoners rift we were top side and winning, I was pushing down mid and 1v3 a {{champion:51}} , {{champion:412}}  and a {{champion:122}} . After beating them a {{champion:11}} came with his ult and I died but I had "Guarding Angel" So I came back and killed the Yi.. In my panic after seeing the the Quadra kill I couldn't find the 5th but my luck he was running past the bot inhib turret hugging it also he was a {{champion:26}} so I would risk him ulting himself.. And he was full health! But the Gods smiled upon me and a {{champion:76}} spear came out the part I can't see and hit the Zilean for half his hp. So, I flashed in with my ult and got him, got the penta and died.. They didn't surrender and we lost the game shortly after.....

replies.body:
I only got a few pentas in bot games. RIP
But i had gotten a few quadras on {{champion:102}}. A {{champion:223}} ate me and stole the penta, {{champion:54}} ulted taking one of the kills, an enemy {{champion:77}} kited me around baron, {{champion:48}} was just {{champion:48}}

ADc's always steal my ranked pentas..... after not contributing at all, they just be sittin botlane farming while me n support 2v5 finnally come and last hit the penta..... every time.

lastone was xin on aram

Was playing an ARAM on my EUW account. Got Amumu. Took almost every kill in the game, resulting in me getting pretty fed despite having the highest number of deaths.

We lost.

> [{quoted}](name=Chaos689,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ttxtTx80,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-07T20:48:56.416+0000)
>
> Ooook then lol?

I'm sorry you don't have a penta to share :(
27 of them in fact... still B4

I was playing jinx on aram.
I had ap runes and masteries.
I decided that I was going to play ap jinx that game.
Got a pentakill.

Easier if I just show you all of my pentas.

First Penta with {{champion:30}}:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PA-n-ZdMpyA

Second Penta with {{champion:17}}:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ipb1al7Ds0A

Third Penta with {{champion:5}}:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cGX0A1zx0Vw

I think the fact only the 2nd one has music and stuff proves which one is my favorite out of them all.
All I remember is that it was Mundo in an ARAM, back when it was played as a custom game on SR. It's been too long to recall specifics.
